title: Reengineering the Business Continuity Planning Process
Reengineering name authority control
items.abstract: <jats:p>This article describes a model for the standardisation of names in bibliographic databases. A prototype that was developed to demonstrate the feasibility of the model is described. Lastly, the impact of implementing this model is investigated. It was found that the new model will revolutionise name authority control. The literature supports such a change. It was also found that the prototype developed verifies the technical feasibility of its implementation.</jats:p>

title: Business process reengineering: an approach for process mapping
Is Healthcare Reengineering Resulting in Union Organizing of Registered Nurses?
